title: Google\Cloud\AIPlatform\V1\ThresholdConfig
name: ThresholdConfig
description:
The config for feature monitoring threshold.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.aiplatform.v1.ThresholdConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.value
params.description: Specify a threshold value that can trigger the alert. If this threshold config is for feature distribution distance: 1. For categorical feature, the distribution distance is calculated by L-inifinity norm. 2. For numerical feature, the distribution distance is calculated by Jensen–Shannon divergence. Each feature must have a non-zero threshold if they need to be monitored. Otherwise no alert will be triggered for that feature.

methods.name: getValue
methods.description:
Specify a threshold value that can trigger the alert.

If this threshold config is for feature distribution distance:

  1. For categorical feature, the distribution distance is calculated by L-inifinity norm.
  2. For numerical feature, the distribution distance is calculated by Jensen–Shannon divergence. Each feature must have a non-zero threshold if they need to be monitored. Otherwise no alert will be triggered for that feature.
